channel.title: CVE Feed for wclovers -- WCFM Membership – WooCommerce Memberships for Multivendor Marketplace
channel.description: The latest CVEs for wclovers -- WCFM Membership – WooCommerce Memberships for Multivendor Marketplace

item.title: CVE-2023-2276|2024-08-02T06:19:14.744Z -- wclovers -- wcfm%20membership%20%E2%80%93%20woocommerce%20memberships%20for%20multivendor%20marketplace
item.description: The WCFM Membership – WooCommerce Memberships for Multivendor Marketplace plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object References in versions up to, and including, 2.10.7. This is due to the plugin providing user-controlled access to objects, letting a user bypass authorization and access system resources. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to change user passwords and potentially take over administrator accounts.
